name: Arctic Penguin Monty in the Frozen Ice Cream Club Hunt Free Game
name_original: Arctic Penguin Monty in the Frozen Ice Cream Club Hunt Free Game
description:
Mmmm…Ice Cream! Little Pinky Penguin just loves ice cream, any time of day and in every flavour ever invented. Now she has been let loose in her most favourite place in the world..the ice cream shop, how dreamy. Lose yourself with Pinky and match up the icy cool flavours in this scrummy puzzle game.

Now just how many ice creams can you eat in a minute? The challenge is on! Move diagonal, up, down and sideways and link as many melty flavours as you can. Munch your way to the top of the game centre leaderboards before all your friends, lets just see who dribbled the most to get there!!

Why not challenge the whole world to a global Penguin ice cream race with multiplayer? Cool and addictive fun, all fans of the icy stuff must apply.


Features:

- Match 3 Game Play for ice cream nuts
- Cute soundtrack
- Game Center Leaderboard
- Multi-Player Game Action
